revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CradlePoint |model=MBR1400 |revision=v2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/05/2012 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model=WRT-795L |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=UXX-MBR1400V2 |ic_id=6219A-MBR1400V2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3883F |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29GL256EHT2I-90Q |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6JB-25 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, ExpressCard/34 (USB) |expansion_expresscard_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=3 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3883F |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=MBR1400-XXX |default_ssid_regex=^MBR1400-[a-f0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass=''randomly generated'' |oui= |oui_eth= }} "WRT-795L Rev. UC" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The device is using a ''Genesys Logic'' GL850G USB 2.0 hub controller.
The default SSID pattern for this device is assumed to be '''MBR1400-xxx''' :(w/ 00:30:44 OUI).. the same as the MBR1400 v1. It is pictured as such on the FCC sample label and described as such :in the FCC manual.
